message: Facebook isn't going anywhere, it's a platform, now we build on it.
when a new platform that is social but adds other elements FB does not cover. Though it will linger like MySpace or AOL access memberships.
Something changes, your facebook connectivity gets broken, your fault.
I hope it gets more competition, I hate their api's :P
maybe with diaspora? Seems interessting... http://www.joindiaspora.com/
diaspora won't be an end to facebook, it might get a little traction but it's not getting a foot in the door.
@garrettholborn I get the vibe that it is going to go the route of OpenID.
